Package model

Class SchemaModel

java.lang.Object
model.SchemaModel
public class SchemaModel extends Object
The SchemaModel class represents the data model for a database schema. It stores tables, the source schema file, and the generated SQL script. This class also provides functionality to generate SQL scripts in different formats and write them to a file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    SchemaModel()
    Constructs an instance of SchemaModel with an empty table list.

    • getFile

      public File getFile()
      Returns the schema file associated with this model.
      Returns:
      the schema file, or null if no file is set

    • setFile

      public void setFile(File file)
      Sets the schema file associated with this model.
      Parameters:
      file - the schema file to set

    • getSqlScript

      public String getSqlScript()
      Returns the generated SQL script.
      Returns:
      the SQL script, or an empty string if it has not been generated

    • setSqlScript

      public void setSqlScript(String sqlScript)
      Sets the generated SQL script.
      Parameters:
      sqlScript - the SQL script to set

    • addTable

      public void addTable(Table table)
      Adds a table to the schema model.
      Parameters:
      table - the Table to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the table is null

    • getTables

      public List<Table> getTables()
      Returns the list of tables in the schema.
      Returns:
      a list of Table objects

    • toScript

      public String toScript(String format)
      Generates an SQL script for the schema in the specified format. The script is written to a file and returned as a string.
      Parameters:
      format - the database format (e.g., "mysql", "oracle")
      Returns:
      the generated SQL script
